name: GPS Tracking ROI
author: GPYes Tracking Solutions

sections.description:
Install a calculator on any page or post which helps to work out the cost savings of installing a gps tracking system in your fleet of vehicles.

Features

  • Runs on JS
  • Lightweight
  • Calculator split onto multiple pages for ease of viewing
  • Inherits the style of your theme.
  • Shortcode available

Credits

GPYes Tracking Solutions
This plugin was created by Sanjeevchugh.
sections.installation:
Install the plugin, activate it and then use the shortcode on any post or page.

[gps_roi_calculator]
sections.faq:
Why did you do this?

We needed a simple calculator to assist our potential customers to work out the increased revenue they would see by installing a gps tracking system.

How do I edit the values?

The non user input values which are used in the calculation can only be edited through code changes.

How are the emails sent?

It will use whatever SMTP plugin you have installed.

short_description: Install a calculator on any page or post which helps to work out the cost savings of installing a gps tracking system in your fleet of vehicles.

screenshots.caption: First page of the calculator. Enter employee details.
Second page of the calculator. Enter vehicle details and fuel usage.
Third page of the calculator. Enter servicing details of your vehicles.
Last page of the calculator. All user input data has been calculated to determine the potential savings. With the option to email a report. Postman SMTP is the mail plugin.
